name: 2DPlat Robot Invasion
description:
This is my 2D Platformer Project for Coursera.

These are some of my changes:

  • Added animation to starting screen with script
  • Changed Hero and its animations
  • Changed Lives icon to hero image
  • Added Credits
  • Added Instructions
  • Changed Menu Colors
  • Added New Audio
  • Added three unique levels
  • Changed the level graphics

Credits:

  • Roy Mullis, 2021
  • Additional Art:
    • Vexed Enigma
  • Additional Audio:
    • Joel Steudier
